caption.title: Present-day distribution of vegetation across Africa.
caption.p: Modeled variations in vegetation cover computed as proportions of C 3 and C 4 plants replotted from 41. White areas indicate deserts. Circle indicates the location of Lake Bosumtwi, Ghana (6°30′N, 1°25′W). Map produced using ESRI ArcGIS software [v.10.3.1], ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis).
